item.title: DynamicCity: Large-Scale LiDAR Generation from Dynamic Scenes
item.description: DynamicCity generates large-scale, high-quality 4D LiDAR scenes capturing dynamic environments, surpassing existing methods in efficiency and accuracy.

item.title: M-RewardBench: Evaluating Reward Models in Multilingual Settings
item.description: M-REWARDBENCH: A new multilingual benchmark reveals significant performance gaps in reward models across languages, highlighting the need for improved multilingual LLM development.

item.title: ARKit LabelMaker: A New Scale for Indoor 3D Scene Understanding
item.description: ARKit LabelMaker creates the largest real-world 3D dataset with dense semantic annotations, boosting performance of 3D semantic segmentation models and accelerating progress in indoor scene understand…

item.title: Steering Your Generalists: Improving Robotic Foundation Models via Value Guidance
item.description: Boosting robot performance at deployment time, Value-Guided Policy Steering (V-GPS) re-ranks actions from existing policies using a value function learned via offline RL, consistently improving perfor…
